plays.text: Goal scored by Vaclav Prospal assisted by Vincent Lecavalier and Brad Lukowich
Penalty to Nolan Pratt 2 minutes for Hooking Craig MacDonald
Penalty to Niclas Wallin 2 minutes for Crosschecking Ben Clymer
Goal scored by Jan Hlavac assisted by Kevyn Adams and Craig Adams
Penalty to Ryan Bayda 2 minutes for Tripping Dave Andreychuk
Penalty to Kevyn Adams 5 minutes for Fighting Nolan Pratt
Penalty to Nolan Pratt 5 minutes for Fighting Kevyn Adams
Penalty to Nolan Pratt 2 minutes for Roughing Kevyn Adams
Penalty to Sean Hill 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Sean Hill 2 minutes for Roughing Alexander Svitov
Penalty to Nikita Alexeev 2 minutes for Roughing Sean Hill
Penalty to Sean Hill 2 minutes for High Sticking Alexander Svitov served by Jan Hlavac
Goal scored by Vaclav Prospal assisted by Dave Andreychuk and Dan Boyle
Goal scored by Jeff O'Neill assisted by Ryan Bayda and Ron Francis
